Can't do it, sorry, I work for Riot now and actually KNOW things for real. Like for REALSIES.

So yeah. Lots I can't say. Will have to tread carefully about what I can say.

Also hi!

Probably never since I'm a contractor, not a proper rioter. 

Still dunno how I managed to land this kind of job. They're clearly bonkers to have brought me in.

They made a tool to chronicle lore stuff called the Sharjonic Archive. They asked me to work on it with them!
I....wow.
Does this mean after you're done with the Archive (or is that a continuous thing?), you'll be able to go back to speculating and such?
It's a continuous thing. Got a bunch of stuff to do yet!
Congratulations anyway. It's still quite cool

We won't. :) 

Congratulations, you deserve it man.
I'll wish you _Infinite Dreams_ then.
Wait how's that different from the universe page?  Is it for riot internally?

:'( I'm glad you work for riot but so sad to see your speculations and story disappear. Lol was literally clicking refresh waiting for your post.

But more than anything else I'm happy for you man. Still looking forward to hearing from you when you **can** post about it.

Also hey long time fan and silent reader of your posts!

I'll still try and discuss where I can, but I'll be skirting around the concept of "talking as if I didn't know better", which can be tricky. So just bear with me. Still ask about stuff, just be aware that I've got things I just can't talk about!

I can talk about what I do for Riot, if only mentioning that what I do is a thing that exists, so if you wanna know that, I can say!

Oh nice i'd like to know what you do for riot, that for sure.

And in does this mean that urf is not only canon but Vastaya? 
Does Rengar know what he is?

What's they correct plural for Vastaya?

And does this confirm Varus' bow as Darkin?

I'll go through this in reverse:

1. I can't talk about anything darkin related. Maybe in the future.
2. Vastayan.
3. Rengar is very aware of what he is. 
4. I'm almost positive Urf isn't in the prime canon. Like 99% positive. That's just my assumptions though; dunno what's up with him really.
5. Riot has a tool that they created to categorise and chronicle lore that ranges from "Players have known this for years" to "Players won't know about this for years", and they asked me to work on it with them! They named the thing the Sharjonic Archives. I lost my shit when they told me that.

OH I have one you can answer or at least discuss.

1.) Seeing as Vastayan have innate magical capabilities, have extreme longevity, super human strength, enhanced senses, sentient levels of intellegence (also taking into account members of their species like Ahri and Rengar who have/would be hostile to humans), What's stopping them from being the dominant sentient species on Runeterra, if not just Ionia? I doubt it would be their nature of being pacifists once again citing Ahri and Rengar. They are seemingly just as intellegent as humans, and I'm not asking why they don't concure the world, just think that they would be the dominant or largest species.

2.) And **personally**, what do you think of humans being the seemingly weakest intelligent race? As lore develops and as we get more races, I don't get the impression of, "hey here's a new race with differences and pros and cons or strengths and weaknesses" as much as I get "oh here's another race that's superior to humans in every sense of the word".
